original_text: They are to lay their hand on its head and slaughter it for a sin offering at the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered.
korean_text: 그 속죄제 제물의 머리에 안수하고 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 속죄제물로 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: They are to lay their hand on its head
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것의 머리에 손을 얹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and slaughter it for a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 죄 제물로 그것을 잡아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: at the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered
